description.text: Ransack ramparts, reduce ruins to rubble, hold your own and brace for flanking fire. Two Cubes and a Base.

ru.original: Ransack ramparts, reduce ruins to rubble, hold your own and brace for flanking fire. Two Cubes and a Base.
ru.translation: Возьми базу врага наскоком и сровняй ее с землей. Отбивай вражеские атаки, но следи за флангами. Два куба и база.

es.original: Ransack ramparts, reduce ruins to rubble, hold your own and brace for flanking fire. Two Cubes and a Base.
es.translation:
Solamente vestigios de lo que alguna vez fue.
Dos generadores y un núcleo.

de.original: Ransack ramparts, reduce ruins to rubble, hold your own and brace for flanking fire. Two Cubes and a Base.
de.translation: Bombadiert Befestigungen und macht euch auf furioses Flankenfeuer gefasst. Zwei Generatoren und eine Basis.

pt.original: Ransack ramparts, reduce ruins to rubble, hold your own and brace for flanking fire. Two Cubes and a Base.
pt.translation: Saqueie as defesas, reduza as ruínas a escombros e prepara-se para se defender do fogo inimigo pelos flancos. Dois Cubos e uma Base.

fr.original: Ransack ramparts, reduce ruins to rubble, hold your own and brace for flanking fire. Two Cubes and a Base.
fr.translation: Mettez à sac les remparts, réduisez les ruines en poussière, tenez vos troupes et préparez-vous à une attaque de flanc. Deux cubes et une base.
